checksum-reception.help: Enable/disable validating checksums in received GRE packets.
checksum-reception.name: checksum-reception

options.help: Do not validate checksums in received GRE packets.
options.name: disable

options.help: Validate checksums in received GRE packets.
options.name: enable

checksum-transmission.help: Enable/disable including checksums in transmitted GRE packets.
checksum-transmission.name: checksum-transmission

options.help: Do not include checksums in transmitted GRE packets.
options.name: disable

options.help: Include checksums in transmitted GRE packets.
options.name: enable

diffservcode.help: DiffServ setting to be applied to GRE tunnel outer IP header.
diffservcode.name: diffservcode

ip-version.help: IP version to use for VPN interface.
ip-version.name: ip-version

keepalive-failtimes.help: Number of consecutive unreturned keepalive messages before a GRE connection is considered down (1 - 255).
keepalive-failtimes.name: keepalive-failtimes

key-inbound.help: Require received GRE packets contain this key (0 - 4294967295).
key-inbound.name: key-inbound

key-outbound.help: Include this key in transmitted GRE packets (0 - 4294967295).
key-outbound.name: key-outbound

local-gw.help: IP address of the local gateway.
local-gw.name: local-gw

local-gw6.help: IPv6 address of the local gateway.
local-gw6.name: local-gw6

remote-gw.help: IP address of the remote gateway.
remote-gw.name: remote-gw

remote-gw6.help: IPv6 address of the remote gateway.
remote-gw6.name: remote-gw6

sequence-number-reception.help: Enable/disable validating sequence numbers in received GRE packets.
sequence-number-reception.name: sequence-number-reception

options.help: Do not validate sequence number in received GRE packets.
options.name: disable

options.help: Validate sequence numbers in received GRE packets.
options.name: enable

sequence-number-transmission.help: Enable/disable including of sequence numbers in transmitted GRE packets.
sequence-number-transmission.name: sequence-number-transmission

options.help: Include sequence numbers in transmitted GRE packets.
options.name: disable

options.help: Do not  include sequence numbers in transmitted GRE packets.
options.name: enable

use-sdwan.help: Enable/disable use of SD-WAN to reach remote gateway.
use-sdwan.name: use-sdwan

options.help: Disable use of SD-WAN to reach remote gateway.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable use of SD-WAN to reach remote gateway.
options.name: enable
